attributes.action: Driving instructors to pass eligible students who are ready to drive.
attributes.additional_details: Due to massive buildup on the driving tests in England it feels unfair to the students who are waiting to do a test and are unable to get one due to the queue of people however they are fully capable to own a full license many spend money on insurance on cars which are sitting there building dust as they are unable to obtain a full license at this current moment in time. This would also clear the huge queue of people waiting for what feels like forever.
attributes.background: Allow driving instructors to pass off students who are ready so they have a full license depending on the vehicle they are training in.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Allow driving instructors to pass learners unable to book a test
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549207

Publish a plan for dealing with the driving test backlog
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558971
